javadoc: Class for tracking scheduled GTasks. When tasks are scheduled, they are assigned to a GTaskGroup, given a priority, assigned a one-up ID, given a GTaskMonitor. This class is used to keep all that information together.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Create a new GScheduledTask when a task is scheduled with the GTaskManager.

params.name: group
params.comment: the group that this task belongs to.

params.name: priority
params.comment:
the priority at which this task is to be executed relative to other 
 scheduled tasks.  Lower numbers are run before higher numbers.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the GTask that is scheduled.
@return the GTask that is scheduled.
methods.name: getTask
methods.comment: Returns the GTask that is scheduled.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the priority at which the task was scheduled. Lower numbers have higher priority.
@return the priority at which the task was scheduled.
methods.name: getPriority
methods.comment: Returns the priority at which the task was scheduled. Lower numbers have higher priority.

return.comment: the priority at which the task was scheduled.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the GTaskMonitor that will be used for this task.
@return the GTaskMonitor that will be used for this task.
methods.name: getTaskMonitor
methods.comment: Returns the GTaskMonitor that will be used for this task.

return.comment: the GTaskMonitor that will be used for this task.

methods.javadoc:
Return GTaskGroup for this task.
@return the GTaskGroup
methods.name: getGroup

methods.javadoc:
Returns the description for the scheduled GTask.
@return the description for the scheduled GTask.
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns the description for the scheduled GTask.

return.comment: the description for the scheduled GTask.

name: GScheduledTask
comment:
Class for tracking scheduled GTasks.  When tasks are scheduled, they are assigned to a GTaskGroup,
 given a priority, assigned a one-up ID, given a GTaskMonitor.  This class is used to keep all
 that information together.
